Sentencas: Ceres Power Ltd (Ceres Power) has been spun-out from Imperial College London (Imperial) after more than 10 years fundamental research.
Titulo: Spinning-out a fuel cell company from a UK University - 2 years of progress at Ceres Power

Sentencas: The studies have shown that is possible to combine ceramic materials, based around doped cerium oxide, with stainless-steel to produce a robust intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC) capable of operating at 500-600 degreesC. Ceres Power has been formed to exploit this technology commercially.
Titulo: Spinning-out a fuel cell company from a UK University - 2 years of progress at Ceres Power

Sentencas: This paper first briefly reviews the process of forming the Company and raising finance.
Titulo: Spinning-out a fuel cell company from a UK University - 2 years of progress at Ceres Power

Sentencas: It then discusses the unique technology platform that is being developed by Ceres Power and summarises some of the technical highlights to date.
Titulo: Spinning-out a fuel cell company from a UK University - 2 years of progress at Ceres Power
